AD.name: Window Label
AD.description: This will be used to title and uniquely identify this Line Graph visualization. If you wish to visualize additional data in this visualization, you will be able to select this by the title you specify here. Note: If you choose an already-existing Line Graph to visualize your data in, this field will be ignored.

AD.name: Window to Display In
AD.description: If you desire to graph your data in an already-existing Line Graph window, you can choose which one here. Otherwise, you can choose to graph your data in a new window.

AD.name: Time Step
AD.description: The column used to order output in the Line Graph
